description: Short on time, but don’t want to compromise on taste? Opt for this cheesy cacio e pepe pasta that’s packed full of veg.
keywords: Pasta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2020,Sesame free,Mushroom,May 2020,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Quick & easy lunch,Peanut free
name: Easy Vegetable Cacio E Pepe Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling salted water for 8 minutes or until al dente. In the last minute of cooking add broccolini. Remove broccolini and set aside, then drain pasta, reserving 11/2 cups pasta water.
Return pasta, reserved liquid and half the butter to pan. Sprinkle over pecorino and peppercorns, then stir to combine for 1 minute or until water, pecorino and butter have emulsified.

Meanwhile, melt remaining butter in a frying pan over high heat. Add mushrooms and garlic and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until mushrooms are tender and garlic is fragrant. Add broccolini and season, tossing well to coat.
Divide pasta among plates. Top with mushroom mixture, scatter over basil leaves and extra pecorino, then serve.
